text: Milen Zhelev (Bulgarian: Милен Желев; born 17 July 1993) is a Bulgarian footballer who currently plays as a midfielder for Arda Kardzhali. ==Career== On 21 June 2017, Zhelev signed with Beroe. ==International career== In November 2016 Zhelev received his first call-up to the senior Bulgaria squad for a match against Belarus, but did not make the final squad for the game. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Bulgarian footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:First Professional Football League (Bulgaria) players Category:Akademik Sofia players Category:PFC Vidima-Rakovski Sevlievo players Category:FC Lokomotiv Gorna Oryahovitsa players Category:PFC Beroe Stara Zagora players Category:FC Arda Kardzhali players Category:Sportspeople from Stara Zagora
title: Milen Zhelev
